00028 #include "qk_pkg.h"

00030 //Q_DEFINE_THIS_MODULE(qk_mutex)

00036 #ifdef QK_NO_MUTEX
00037     #error "qk_mutex.cpp included in the build when QK_NO_MUTEX defined"
00038 #endif
00039 
00040 // package-scope objects -----------------------------------------------------
00041 uint8_t volatile QK_ceilingPrio_;               // ceiling priority of a mutex
00042 
00043 //............................................................................
00044 QMutex QK::mutexLock(uint8_t prioCeiling) {
00045     QK_INT_LOCK_KEY_
00046     QK_INT_LOCK_();
00047     uint8_t mutex = QK_ceilingPrio_; // original QK priority ceiling to return
00048     if (QK_ceilingPrio_ < prioCeiling) {
00049         QK_ceilingPrio_ = prioCeiling;        // raise the QK priority ceiling
00050     }
00051 
00052     QS_BEGIN_NOLOCK_(QS_QK_MUTEX_LOCK, (void *)0, (void *)0)
00053         QS_TIME_();                                               // timestamp
00054         QS_U8_(mutex);                                // the original priority
00055         QS_U8_(QK_ceilingPrio_);               // the current priority ceiling
00056     QS_END_NOLOCK_()
00057 
00058     QK_INT_UNLOCK_();
00059     return mutex;
00060 }
00061 //............................................................................
00062 void QK::mutexUnlock(QMutex mutex) {
00063     QK_INT_LOCK_KEY_
00064     QK_INT_LOCK_();
00065 
00066     QS_BEGIN_NOLOCK_(QS_QK_MUTEX_UNLOCK, (void *)0, (void *)0)
00067         QS_TIME_();                                               // timestamp
00068         QS_U8_(mutex);                                // the original priority
00069         QS_U8_(QK_ceilingPrio_);               // the current priority ceiling
00070     QS_END_NOLOCK_()
00071 
00072     if (QK_ceilingPrio_ > mutex) {
00073         QK_ceilingPrio_ = mutex;         // restore the saved priority ceiling
00074         QK_SCHEDULE_();
00075     }
00076     QK_INT_UNLOCK_();
00077 }
